import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Row, Col, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { Control, Form, Errors, actions } from "react-redux-form"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const required = val => val && val.length; const maxLength = len => val => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = len => val => val && val.length >= len; const isNumber = val => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = val => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { console.log("Current State is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); alert("Current State is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); this.props.feedback( values.firstname, values.lastname, values.telnum, values.email, values.agree, values.message, console.log(values) ); debugger; this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); // event.preventDefault(); } render() { return (

this.handleSubmit(values)} >
); } } export default Contact;
